text: Catch Me If You Can is a 1980 book by Frank Abagnale. It talks about the four years that Abagnale was a con artist. Abagnale sold the rights to make a movie before writing the book. He wrote the book with a person named Stan Redding. The movie Catch Me If You Can was released in 2002. Category:1980 books Category:American autobiographies
title: Catch Me If You Can (book)
